title: 06/09/2021 - HOUR 1 - Clippers-Jazz, Simmons, LeBron
itunes:title: 06/09/2021 - HOUR 1 - Clippers-Jazz, Simmons, LeBron
description:
The Clippers lost game 1 against the Jazz, but Colin believes they will win the series

Ben Simmons doesn't seem to care as much as Joel Embiid

LeBron James isn't hated as you may think


Guest: Nick Wright
